attributes.action: Oblige Parliament to debate Article 50 of The Treaty of Lisbon.
attributes.background: We the undersigned call upon the Government not to invoke Article 50 of The Treaty of Lisbon. Exiting the EU will be detrimental to the economic health of the UK and will wreck the UK economy. The referendum was advisory and not binding. Parliament is sovereign and should debate Article 50.

rejection.details:
We think the following petition is similar to yours:
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/133540
